Text: When unrar'ing, unfortunately I get a CRC error for Day 1.  Days 2 and 3 extracted fine.

I get the same error when I unzip it with 7zip, but i'm still able to view all the videos in it.. 

Alternatively, if you are using WinRar, you could "Repair Damage Archive"..
Day 1 seems to play okay even though it had a CRC error.  I didn't watch every minute of it, I skipped through it in 10-minute increments, but it looked okay.
Okay thanks for the info.. hope you'll enjoy it=)
Same here ......CRC error, but video play fine STILL.  Keep up the good works Eliadias.....have been looking for all your uploads for a long time, with constant torment for passworded spammer.

eliasdias, thanks for the up but I am not able to get Day 1 unzipped/unrared. I am using Winrar and have tried repairing any which way possible, but no luck!
Is it possible to upload just the Day 1 seperately? Thanks mate.

fyrkant44: Hi, the original file I downloaded came with a CRC error.. Uploading it separately won't solve the problem.

How bout try using a software called "7zip".. Its small and light and easy to use.
Thanks Eliasdias!!! 7zip did it. Works fine. Though its interesting why Winrar couldn't unzip that. Anyway, Thanks Heaps.
